title: Ya Vamos. No. 1. A Mexico
creator_credit: Holt, Rinehart and Winston and Joshua Tree Productions
brief_description: A Spanish language film. Provides some cultural background of Mexico to students learning elementary Spanish with the text “entender y hablar”. Shows Lucia Sznchez and Sara Lopez travelling throughout Mexico.
creator_credit_for_label: Holt, Rinehart and Winston and Joshua Tree Productions
